001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.handling;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.log.LogUi;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.enums.WebElementAction;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.helper.FrameHelper;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.helper.LocatorParser;
007import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebElement;
008import java.time.Duration;
009import org.openqa.selenium.By;
010import org.openqa.selenium.NoSuchElementException;
011import org.openqa.selenium.TimeoutException;
012import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver;
013import org.openqa.selenium.WebElement;
014import org.openqa.selenium.interactions.Actions;
015import org.openqa.selenium.support.ui.ExpectedConditions;
016import org.openqa.selenium.support.ui.WebDriverWait;
017
018/**
019 * Provides utility functions for handling WebElement exceptions.
020 *
021 * <p>This class defines methods to recover from common Selenium exceptions
022 * such as {@link NoSuchElementException}, {@link TimeoutException}, and
023 * {@link org.openqa.selenium.StaleElementReferenceException}. It aims to
024 * improve test stability by implementing fallback strategies for locating and
025 * interacting with elements.
026 * </p>
027 *
028 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
029 */
030public class ExceptionHandlingWebElementFunctions {
031
032   private ExceptionHandlingWebElementFunctions() {
033   }
034
035   /**
036    * Handles a stale element reference by attempting to re-locate the element.
037    *
038    * @param driver           The WebDriver instance.
039    * @param element          The stale {@link SmartWebElement}.
040    * @param webElementAction The action to be performed on the element.
041    * @param args             Additional arguments required for the action.
042    * @return The result of the attempted action.
043    */
044   public static Object handleStaleElement(WebDriver driver, SmartWebElement element,
045                                           WebElementAction webElementAction, Object... args) {
046      try {
047         element = LocatorParser.updateWebElement(driver, element);
048         return WebElementAction.performAction(driver, element.getOriginal(), webElementAction, args);
049      } catch (Exception e) {
050         String errorMessage = String.format(
051               "[BROKEN] WebElement action '%s' failed for stale element exception",
052               webElementAction.getMethodName());
053         LogUi.error(errorMessage);
054         throw e;
055      }
056   }
057
058
059   /**
060    * Handles the case where an element is not found by searching within iframes.
061    *
062    * @param driver           The WebDriver instance.
063    * @param element          The {@link SmartWebElement} that was not found.
064    * @param webElementAction The action to be performed if the element is found.
065    * @param args             Additional arguments required for the action.
066    * @return The result of the attempted action if the element is found.
067    * @throws NoSuchElementException If the element cannot be found in any iframe.
068    */
069   public static Object handleNoSuchElement(WebDriver driver, SmartWebElement element,
070                                            WebElementAction webElementAction, Object... args) {
071      if (args.length == 0 || !(args[0] instanceof By)) {
072         LogUi.error("Invalid or missing locator argument for FIND_ELEMENT.");
073         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Action requires a By locator.");
074      }
075
076      if (webElementAction == WebElementAction.FIND_ELEMENTS) {
077         WebElement container = FrameHelper.findContainerIframe(driver, (By) args[0]);
078         if (container != null) {
079            return webElementAction.performActionWebDriver(driver, args);
080         }
081      } else {
082         WebElement foundElement = FrameHelper.findElementInIframes(driver, element.getOriginal());
083         if (foundElement != null) {
084            return webElementAction.performActionWebElement(driver, foundElement, args);
085         }
086      }
087
088      String errorMessage = String.format(
089            "[BROKEN] WebElement action '%s' could not be executed - Element with locator '%s' not found.",
090            webElementAction.getMethodName(), args[0]
091      );
092
093      LogUi.error(errorMessage);
094      throw new NoSuchElementException("Element not found in any iframe.");
095   }
096
097
098   /**
099    * Handles the case where an element is intercepted by another element when clicked.
100    *
101    * @param driver           The WebDriver instance.
102    * @param element          The {@link SmartWebElement} that was intercepted.
103    * @param webElementAction The action to be retried after waiting for the blocker to disappear.
104    * @param exception        The exception that occurred during the click action.
105    * @param args             Additional arguments required for the action.
106    * @return The result of the attempted action.
107    */
108   public static Object handleElementClickIntercepted(WebDriver driver, SmartWebElement element,
109                                                      WebElementAction webElementAction, Exception exception,
110                                                      Object... args) {
111      String xpathExpression = null;
112      try {
113         xpathExpression = LocatorParser.extractBlockingElementLocator(exception.getMessage());
114         By blocker = By.xpath(xpathExpression);
115         WebDriverWait wait = new WebDriverWait(driver, Duration.ofSeconds(2));
116
117         waitInvisibilityIgnoringTimeout(wait, blocker);
118
119         return WebElementAction.performAction(driver, element.getOriginal(), webElementAction, args);
120      } catch (Exception e) {
121         String errorMessage = String.format(
122               "[BROKEN] WebElement action '%s' failed due to intercepted click with locator '%s'. Exception: '%s'",
123               webElementAction.getMethodName(),
124               (xpathExpression == null ? "Cannot Extract Locator" : xpathExpression),
125               e.getClass().getSimpleName()
126         );
127         LogUi.error(errorMessage);
128         throw e;
129      }
130   }
131
132
133   /**
134    * Handles the case where an element is not interactable by scrolling to it and retrying the action.
135    *
136    * @param driver           The WebDriver instance.
137    * @param element          The {@link SmartWebElement} that was not interactable.
138    * @param webElementAction The action to be retried.
139    * @param args             Additional arguments required for the action.
140    * @return The result of the attempted action.
141    */
142   public static Object handleElementNotInteractable(WebDriver driver, SmartWebElement element,
143                                                     WebElementAction webElementAction, Object... args) {
144      try {
145         element = LocatorParser.updateWebElement(driver, element);
146         WebDriverWait wait = new WebDriverWait(driver, Duration.ofSeconds(2));
147         Actions actions = new Actions(driver);
148         actions.moveToElement(element.getOriginal()).perform();
149         WebElement clickableElement = wait.until(ExpectedConditions.elementToBeClickable(element.getOriginal()));
150
151         return WebElementAction.performAction(driver, clickableElement, webElementAction, args);
152      } catch (Exception e) {
153         String errorMessage = String.format(
154               "[BROKEN] WebElement action '%s' failed because element was not interactable. Exception: '%s'",
155               webElementAction.getMethodName(), e.getClass().getSimpleName()
156         );
157         LogUi.error(errorMessage);
158         throw e;
159      }
160   }
161
162
163   private static void waitInvisibilityIgnoringTimeout(WebDriverWait wait, By blocker) {
164      try {
165         wait.until(ExpectedConditions.invisibilityOfElementLocated(blocker));
166      } catch (TimeoutException e) {
167         LogUi.warn("Blocking element did not disappear after waiting, attempting action anyway.");
168      }
169   }
170
171}
